data.title: Lisa Dunne on LinkedIn: Please consider supporting the growth of an Irish language school in…
data.meta_description: Please consider supporting the growth of an Irish language school in Melbourne, if you have space to spare at your school. We’d really appreciate…
data.text:
To make friends you need to: develop exclusivity. Exclusivity means memories, experiences, and knowledge you uniquely share with one other person. If you joined a soccer league you can generate exclusivity by saying: I love playing soccer together. Would you be open to getting a bite together after our next game? If you started a new job, exclusivity looks like: want to have lunch together today? If you’re deepening an existing connection, exclusivity looks like: can I share something with you that I’ve been struggling with? It’s great to put ourselves in situations where we can meet new people. But it’s difficult to feel like friends if you only ever see each other in group contexts. EXCLUSIVITY turns a new person into a friend. It’s great to connect one-on-one but we can get even closer if we share knowledge with one another (vulnerability) that others don’t know. 👇🏽What are some ways you have generated exclusivity? #Connection #Belonging

Noah Darvich - Scout Report 🔸 Nationality: Germany 🔸 Birth Date: 25/09/2006 🔸 Club: Barcelona (Spain) 🔸 Position: AM / CM 🔸 Strong foot: Left 🔸 Height: 1.86 cm / 72 kg 🔹 Potential: A (Player for top club) 🔹 Summary: Noah Darvich is an emerging talent hailing from Germany, born in 2006, with a towering height of 184 cm. He possesses exceptional technical abilities, a knack for creative playmaking, and a flair for dribbling that sets him apart as a potential future star 🔸 Technical: Noah boasts a remarkable first touch, particularly with his left foot, but he also exhibits confidence with his right. His ball control and dribbling skills are outstanding, making him a superb combination of dribbler and creator. He excels at accelerating the game through his dribbling and precise passing, often propelling his team into scoring positions. His technique is exemplary, demonstrated by his ability to execute quick direction shifts, short dribbles, and precise short-to-mid-range passing 🔸 Tactical: Darvich is a creative player with a keen understanding of the game.He possesses excellent footballing intelligence and vision on the field. His mobility, rapid acceleration, and ability to change direction quickly allow him to navigate through tight spaces with ease. He exhibits a strong inclination for one-on-one situations, where he can showcase his dribbling skills and create opportunities for himself and his teammates. His ability to blend speed and creativity makes him a valuable asset in advancing his team's offensive plays. 🔸 Physical: With a height of 184 cm, Noah possesses physical stature that offers advantages, but he does not excel in aerial duels. His mobility and acceleration compensate for his height, allowing him to excel in other aspects of his game 🔹 Weakness: One noticeable weakness in Noah game is his lack of aerial dominance. Given his height, there is room for improvement in this aspect of his play. Developing his ability to win headers and be more effective in aerial duels would add another dimension to his game. ✅ Potential: A (Player for top club) Given his age and the current trajectory of his development, Noah Darvich has the potential to rise to prominence in the world of football. With continued dedication to his craft and focused efforts to enhance his aerial abilities, he could easily establish himself as a pivotal figure for both club and country in the coming years. His future looks bright, and he is one to watch closely as he continues to hone his skills. FC Barcelona #scouting #NoahDarvich #FM23 #youthscouting👇

🇬🇷l The most talented youngster in Greece currently and one of the most promising talents that they've produced in the last years. 🌟𝗚𝗶𝗮𝗻𝗻𝗶𝘀 𝗞𝗼𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗹𝗶𝗮𝘀 🌟 𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐈𝐧𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: Place of birth: Volos Date of birth: Mar 5, 2003 Citizenship: Greece Club: PAOK Preferred Foot: Both Position: CAM-LW Height: 1,78 m Weight: 66 kg Agency: ProHeroes MV: €8.00m Contract: 30/06/2027 ❓𝐁𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐠𝐫𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝: Giannis Konstantelias was born in Volos, Greece. His first club was Agia Paraskevi. Initially, he trained with his peers, but he quickly got into the training of the older ones and in 2013 he joined PAOK's youth system.At the very first place, Giannis was characterized as a bright star and one of the promising talents of Greece. A player who even at a young age already felt ready and willing to take risks. A player who always wanted to improve and show that he is the best on the field.At youth tournaments, Giannis was always asking for a chance to prove himself and to show what he is capable to do. And indeed, every time that he was getting minutes he was the best on the field and the one who impressed his coaches more. Barcelona and Fulham were the most interested clubs for his signature and indeed made some official offers back then which none of them were accepted from PAOK and the Greek side decided that the right option for the player was to stay in Greece for his development. 🟢 𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐠𝐭𝐡𝐬: ◽️ Giannis is one of the most technical players in the league & so comfortable with the ball at his feet. ◽️ He's got a great understanding of the game, he knows exactly what to do. ◽️ Football IQ, he is always thinking how to improve during the game. ◽️ Dribbling skills, he is capable of getting past more than 2/3 opponents easily and then look for spaces or some key passes to control the flow of the game. ◽️ Intelligence & passing skills, very good visibility for where he intends to pass and always scans the field. ◽️ Freedom of movement & body position, he has the ability to move into the spaces that are created and quickly cover any distances. ◽️ Shooting technique, his body position allows him to get into a position that will find his opponents vulnerable and he will be able to shoot. ◽️ Quick decision making, Giannis is always calm and able to act according to the situation he is in. He can put pressure on his opponent when he won't even expect it. ◽️ He can keep possession of the ball and let the flow of the game depend on the moves he chooses to make. 🔴 𝗪𝗲𝗮𝗸𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗲𝘀: ◽️ Physical attributes, needs to work harder on his athleticism & stamina. Needs to cover more km during the match and contribute more during defensive transition. ◽️ Ball Interceptions - Aggressiveness while trying to defend and steal the ball. #scouting #greece #paok #freelance #talents
